snippet: Alfredo di Stéfano, the European player of the year in 1957 and ’59, is in critical condition in a Madrid hospital after having a heart attack, Real Madrid said Saturday.
abstract: Alfredo di Stefano, Argentine who became European soccer star in the 1950s, is in critical condition in a Madrid hospital after having a heart attack.
lead_paragraph: Alfredo di Stéfano, the European player of the year in 1957 and ’59, is in critical condition in a Madrid hospital after having a heart attack, Real Madrid said Saturday.

headline.print_headline: European Star of 1950s Has a Heart Attack
